Package CAMs_App.boundary

Class LoginMenu

java.lang.Object
CAMs_App.boundary.LoginMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
Menu
public class LoginMenu extends Object implements Menu
The LoginMenu implements the generic menu, Menu. It provides methods to print the main menu and viewing the application

      public void printMenu()

      Specified by:
      printMenu in interface Menu

    • viewApp

      public void viewApp()
      Displays the login menu and reads the user input for role selection or exitting program. This method uses a switch case statements to handle the user inputs.

      • 1 - Staff login: Initiates staff login and navigates to the StaffMenu.
      • 2 - Student login: Initiates student login and navigates to the StudentMenu
      • 3 - Exit program: Ends the session and terminates the program.
      • Invalid selections prompt the user to choose again.

      Users are given total of 5 attempts for login. If the user is logged in for the first time, the user will be prompted to change password.

      Specified by:
      viewApp in interface Menu
